meaningMnemonic: You <radical>walk</radical> by a <radical>geoduck</radical> a <kanji>frequent</kanji> amount. This geoduck really intrigues you, so you can’t help but frequent the area the geoduck is in and walk around.
readingMnemonic: Apparently Hindu people also love geoducks because <reading>Hin</reading>du (ひん) people <kanji>frequent</kanji> this area quite often as well. You always see the geoduck here, but also a lot of Hindu people.
